uploadMeme.title: Upload a Meme
uploadMeme.name: Name
uploadMeme.name-placeholder: Enter a descriptive name for your meme
uploadMeme.tags-note: Include as many tags as you can (such as movie/show name, actor/actress relevant text etc.) to simplify searching for that meme
uploadMeme.image-url-placeholder: Image Link from social media like X, fb, etc
uploadMeme.image-url-note: Only a small subset of urls is allowed so if that fails try downloading the image and uploading the file
uploadMeme.upload-error-description: This is can be either due to image size (>2MB) or the provided url is not allowed. Try downloading the image and uploading the file
